description:
Upon arriving to the village, Mitsuri rushes to the chief of the village, Tecchin, and finds that all of his guards have been defeated and he himself is in a life-or-death situation. Muichiro is being guided by Kanamori, whom he rescued along the way, to the studio to receive his sword. However, Upper Five Gyokko is waiting in front of the studio, where Haganezuka is also working...
Source: crunchyroll
